name: Jayski: Containment Breach DEMO (SCP:CB MOD)
description:
This is a demo for my mod Jayski: Containment Breach a huge fan mode based on the youtuber Jayski Bean for the game SCP: Containment Breach!

Jayski's Channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDjdeXik4EnQ9ijvrsUtWaA

What pushed me to make this mod - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hM-olOzOmZ0

JayskiBean's Fan Discord - https://discord.gg/jMqP9pa
